title: Let's Make Lemonade
subtle: How to (nonfiction), 81 words, Level E (Grade 1), Lexile 200L
description: It's a hot day, and the kids are thirsty for a cold drink. What will they make? In Let's Make Lemonade, students will learn how to make this sweet, cold drink. They will have the opportunity to sequence events in this simple how-to book. Detailed illustrations, repetitive text, and high-frequency words support early readers.
meta: lemons, pitcher, roll, seeds, spot, spill, squeeze, sticky sweet, thirsty
Use the reading strategy of connecting to prior knowledge to understand text
Consonant Blends : Identify initial consonant blend sp
High-Frequency Words : Understand, use, and write the high-frequency word our

Promote higher-order thinking for small groups
or whole class
